extendedInfo.description: Chennai TrainDroid(CTD) is a simple,clean and a handy app for MRTS commuters in Chennai. This app covers all the MRTS train routes across the Chennai city limits. Routes covered by CTD are: 1.Beach <-> Tambaram2.Beach <-> Velacherry3.Beach <-> Chengalpattu4.Beach <-> Sulurupetta5.Beach <-> Tiruttani6.Chengalpattu <-> Thirumalpur How to Use this App?Select your Route -> Check/Uncheck for Sunday timings ->Search with From & To stations / Only From stationsAnd thatâs it!App Highlights:Return Journey Just a click away â The app has auto update option that fills your return schedule based on your first selectionEnjoy Offline â The app works perfectly in offline mode. Save it on the go - App can be saved in SD cardHome Station option- Choosing your HOME station is just a onetime activity. Home station will become your favorite bookmark.  Like our App? Rate us in Android market & Share itâ¦ And Yes! We want to hear your feedback.****YOUR FEEDBACK IS OUR ONLY FUEL***** Enjoy CTD and happy travel ï Disclaimer: All train timings displayed in the app are as on the official website of southern railways www.sr.indianrailways.gov.inSupporters : www.netpines.com

reviews.title: Simple and cool
reviews.comment: You cn plan ur activities beautifully if u r depending n train using ds app. lovely
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb...
reviews.comment: This application is very useful to the people who is travelling around chennai using metro trains. it covers the time table of all the sub urban trains of chennai....  really simple and superb application.
reviews.author: Senthil Murugan

reviews.title: A very useful app
reviews.comment: Great app, very useful for Chennai train commuters, shows accurate train timings. Can add more features such as calculating travel time, distance, etc., between two stations. Good job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and cool app..!
reviews.comment: Simple and cool app..!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Force closes everytime I try to open the app. It worked fine on gingerbread. This happens only with ICS. Please fix
reviews.author: Rashika Murugiah

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: this z d app i use d most... it is a life saviour for me. however d room for improvement includes writing \"fast\" against d fast ones.. and also once a person chooses a route that route must b selected by default d next tym one opens it. once again - thanku developers..  galaxy y
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: really usefull app, it has chengalpet route info also which other apps dnt hav. accurate and reliable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gives incorrect details
reviews.comment: I tried this app and found that when i choose ambattur - tiruttani train timings , it displays incorrect details like 5-10 trains available to tiruttani every one hour. you can check the same. I take this chennai -tiruttani route often , hence checked this route nad found incorrect. Developer, please fix this...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesum app..!
reviews.comment: Exact time schedule for trains in Chennai..very useful.must install
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force closes on Sony live with walkman after updating to ICS :-(

reviews.title: Excellent app
